title: Unlocalized strings on hardlink failure on non-Windows
body:
unrelated to this PR, there seem to be some unlocalized strings in this path
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/85ee5a3083488dcc1f64b1e84951be6ce5be2c98/src/Tasks/NativeMethods.cs#L816
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/85ee5a3083488dcc1f64b1e84951be6ce5be2c98/src/Tasks/NativeMethods.cs#L850
